recipe.title: Apple Bok Choy Salad
ingredients: 1/2 cup unsweetened soy, hemp, or almond milk
1/2 cup raw cashews or 1/4 cup raw cashew butter
instructions: Combine bok choy, apple, carrot, and chopped onion in a large bowl. Blend soy milk, cashews, vinegar, raisins, and mustard in a food processor or high-powered blender. Add desired amount to chopped vegetables.
